chapters.title: Chapter 47:  More Tales of the Wheel
chapters.info: al'Akir Mandragoran, p. 595—Last crowned king of Malkier, Lan's father. He died, with his country, the day the Trollocs attacked Malkier. See also Gemallen, Cowin; Mandragoran, Breyan; Mandragoran, Isam; Mandragoran, Lain; Mandragoran, Lan; ti Mandragoran, Leanna.
